testcase.classname: Getting errors when entering invalid payment info
testcase.name: Adopting one puppy from the website
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the puppy adoption site "http://localhost:3000"...............passed When I click the View Details button for "Brook"............................passed And I click the Adopt Me! button............................................passed And I click the Complete the Adoption button................................passed And I complete the adoption using no information............................passed Then I should see this error message "5 errors prohibited this order from being saved:".passed
